fields.fieldTitle: What type of bullets are you creating?

fieldHint.hint2: Ex: Tip; Timestamp; Bonus; Strategy; Page; Point, etc

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: pass your pt test; make more money; get a better job; write a book fast; figure out the most profitable titles to write a book about; fix your dog's aggression problems in social situations, etc.
Ex: confidence in your testing ability; traffic to your website to sell your book; confident to take your dog out in public, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: "My product / service makes it EASY to ______."

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: crush your next pt test; finish your book in less than a week; detect what's causing your dog's aggression and take proper corrective action, etc
Ex: the confidence to do well on your pt test; the confidence to finish your book and start selling it; the tools you need to respond to all different types of aggression, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: My product / service helps you AVOID ______.

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: the common PT testing mistakes that kill your results; the big mistakes that cause most people to quit before they really get started; letting your dog's aggression get out of control, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: My product/service helps you discover the real SECRET for __.

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: getting a perfect score on your PT test; how to get a book done in record time; how to get your dog calmed down quickly once agitated, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: My product / service helps you with HOW TO ______.

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: train for your next PT test; even if you're not ready now; get free editing services for your book without having to hire an editor; help your dog avoid situations that can cause them to lash out, even at family members, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: My product / service helps you EFFORTLESSLY ______.

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: create the perfect training plan that's right for you; target the most profitable audience for your book; train your dog to feel calm and relaxed in situations that used to make them upset, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: My product / service helps you QUICKLY ______.

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: get ready for your next PT test; get your book listed for sale on Amazon and other book marketing sites; head off problems before they get started, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: My product / service helps you ESCAPE ______.

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: from the worry and stress of failing your PT test; the pain of having to spend weeks or months writing your book; having to use physical punishment on your dog, etc

fields.fieldTitle: My product / service helps you DISCOVER ______.

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: the best way to MAX your PT test; the secrets the pros use to make a ton of back end sales from their books; the best ways for your specific dog to receive the training they need, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: My product / service helps you STOP worrying about ______.

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: how you're going to pass that PT test, even if it's only a couple of weeks away; the process and focus on just getting your book done, edited, and posted for sale; the potential danger of your dog harming someone else when you take them out in public, etc.
